.table-item p, .table-item a, .table-item a:link { font-size: 16px; font-weight: 500; line-height: 22px; color: var(--primary-colorsgray-700); } .table-line { border-bottom: 1px solid #d4d6d8; } .item-title { display: flex; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 17.44px; color: #55606E; } .item-value { display: flex; flex-direction: column; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 500; line-height: 17.44px; color: #232E3D; } .item-value a, .item-value span { color: #232E3D; } .annotation { display: flex; gap: 4px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; line-height: 15.26px; color:
